search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Wootric by InMoment (wootric.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Wootric by InMoment can be found at: [https://www.wootric.com/pricing/](https://www.wootric.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
**Grow with Wootric.**
----------------------

**Plans and pricing that scale with your needs.**
-------------------------------------------------

**Professional**
----------------

Act on one journey point for your business

[Get Started Now](https://www.wootric.com/request-demo/)

One journey point

Track a single metric:  Choose between NPS, CSAT, or CES

Leverage multiple delivery channels:

*   Web app
*   Mobile app
*   Email
*   Link
*   Intercom Messenger

Auto-categorize feedback themes

Trigger surveys via Intercom, Zendesk, Freshdesk, and Mixpanel

Up to five seats

Self-service support

#### Integrations

![Image 7: Segment logo](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Segment-wootric2023.png)

Our most popular plan

**Growth**
----------

Solutions for multiple CX journey points

[Choose Growth](https://www.wootric.com/request-demo/)

Three journey points

Leverage multiple delivery channels:

*   Web app
*   Mobile app
*   Email
*   Link
*   Intercom Messenger
*   SMS

Auto-categorize feedback themes

Trigger surveys from any integration partner

Up to 10 seats

Premium support

Advanced survey targeting

#### Integrations

![Image 18: Microsoft logo](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Microsoft%201-wootric2023.png)

![Image 19: Heap logo](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Heap-wootric2023.png)

Our most powerful plan

**Voice of the Customer**
-------------------------

Get every world-class feature included in our Growth plan PLUS:

**CXInsight™**

**Text and sentiment analytics**

**Import and analyze feedback from any source**

**Custom dashboards and reporting**

[Contact Us](https://www.wootric.com/request-demo/)

Every Wootric plan includes

![Image 20](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Icon%20-%2032px%20-%20plug.png)API Access

![Image 21](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Icon%20-%2032px%20-%20doc-out.png)Export data

![Image 22](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Icon%20-%2032px%20-%20envelope.png)Email alerts

![Image 23](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Icon%20-%2032px%20-%20key.png)Single Sign-On

![Image 24](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Icon%20-%2032px%20-%20doc-in.png)Import historical survey data

![Image 25](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Icon%20-%2032px%20-%20users.png)Customer profile and timelines

![Image 26](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Icon%20-%2032px%20-%20comment.png)Unlimited responses from up to 25k customers

![Image 27](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Icon%20-%2032px%20-%20stack.png)Segment data by any business driver

![Image 28](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Icon%20-%2032px%20-%20tag.png)Auto-categorize feedback themes

![Image 29](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Icon%20-%2032px%20-%20ear.png)Support for multiple languages

Add-on Services
---------------

![Image 30: ReviewTrackers logo](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/ReviewTrackers-logo-over-gray.png)

### Integrate with ReviewTrackers

View customer reviews from the Apple App Store and the Google Play Store inside a Microsurvey CSAT project.

![Image 31: HSBC logo](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/HSBC.png)

![Image 32: Zoom logo](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Zoom.png)

![Image 33: Docusign logo](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Docusign.png)

![Image 34: Hubspot logo](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Hubspot.png)

![Image 35: Visma logo](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Visma.png)

![Image 36: Glassdoor logo](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/Glassdoor.png)

![Image 37: decorative quote icon](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/wootric-quote.png)

We tripled our response rate for a target segment of customers using Wootric. Further, Wootric's platform has enabled us to close the loop more effectively with our customers, allowing us to increase our NPS scores across all segments."

![Image 38](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/kirsty-traill-co.png)

**Kirsty Traill**VP Customer — Hootsuite

![Image 39: decorative quote icon](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/wootric-quote.png)

Smartly segmented NPS data was a big win with Wootric. To now have this customer data and feedback at the fingertips of every Salesforce user in our organization is HUGE!

![Image 40](https://www.wootric.com/wp-content/themes/wootric/img/jim-mercer-co.png)

**Jim Mercer**Head of Customer Success — Zoom

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

### **I use another vendor for feedback collection. Can I apply Wootric analytics to these survey responses?**

Absolutely. There is no need to leave your survey vendor to take advantage of Wootric’s advanced analytics. You can import feedback from any source into Wootric for text & sentiment analysis, watch list reports, user views and more. You can also import online reviews, tweets and other data to create a holistic view of Voice of Customer in one platform. Analyze feedback by data source, by customer segment, by journey point and other important business drivers.

### **How do I upgrade to a paid account?**

If you would like to upgrade your account, our team can help! [Schedule time here](https://reviewtrackers.chilipiper.com/book/me/sarang-bhatt?type=wootric-inbound-demo) to work with our team to select the package that works for you.

### **Can I change the follow-up NPS question based on response (Promoter, Detractor, Passive)?**

Yes, you can customize three different follow-up questions in the Wootric dashboard.

### **I want to give colleagues access to my Wootric account, is there a limit?**

It is possible to add users to your account, and each user will have a permission level set by your administrator.

### **Can you import my NPS data and other feedback sources?**

Absolutely! Enterprise customers unify their view by bringing customer and employee feedback data from any source into Wootric.

Compare Wootric pricing plans and packages for Wootric's customer experience management and customer feedback survey software. Get started today.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing details are provided upon request via demo or contact form.
